entries.description: Help > View Toolkit Logs opens an empty file if other menu items were interacted with first.
CodeWhisperer: Increase polling frequency for security scans.
Opening a CodeCatalyst dev env triggers a builder ID login in certain situations.
Amazon Q: Fixed an issue where sometimes /transform won't appear when switching between idC/builder id
Amazon Q: 'Switch to Q Chat' button not working for some users.
CodeWhisperer security scans support ruby files.
The `aws.samcli.enableCodeLenses` setting now enables/disables SAM codelenses in `template.yaml` files, in addition to source code files.
CodeWhisperer security scans now support Go files.
